item.description:
Nothing beats the cold weather like some quality live music. Join us on Thursday, February 18th at the House of Blues to listen to a great UK band.

Tickets are $20 at the door or $29 online at http://www.houseofblu...

Doors open at 7 pm, show starts at 8 pm.

Editors are a British indie rock band based in Birmingham, who formed in 2002. Their own variation of dark indie guitar rock draws on influences from both older and contemporary bands. Their influences include Echo & the Bunnymen, Joy Division, The Strokes, The Walkmen, R.E.M. and Elbow. Upon Editors' first appearances in the British music scene, they were also heavily compared to American indie band Interpol; however both bands have strongly played down the associations.

Some of their songs ....

"An end has a start"
http://www.youtube.co...

"Papillion"
http://www.youtube.co...

"The Weight of the World"
http://www.youtube.co...

"Spiders"
http://www.youtube.co...
